mainSequence.step: Citizen navigates to the application.
Citizen logs in with a session.
Citizen's data is bootstrapped.
Citizen edits the data.
Citizen's process in the application finishes.
Citizen navigates to Office 1 application.
Citizen logs in to Office 1 application without a session.
Access is granted via Access Request and Access Grant.
Citizen reads data and fills a form.
Data is manually filled in the form.
Data is saved to Office 1 citizen storage.
Message to save data is sent to the citizen's inbox.
Process in Office 1 application finishes.
Citizen navigates back to their application.
Citizen logs in with a session.
Data is merged from the inbox to the main data.
Process in Citizen's main application finishes.
Citizen navigates to Office 2 application.
Citizen logs in to Office 2 application without a session.
Access is granted via Access Request and Access Grant.
Citizen reads data and fills a form.
Data is read from a reference.
Data is manually filled in the form.
Data is saved to Office 2 citizen storage.
Message to save data is sent to the citizen's inbox.
Process in Office 2 application finishes.
Process in Citizen's interactions finishes.
